title: Learner Profiling and Technology Challenge Overcoming Strategies in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Real-time online classes for adult working professionals in science, conducted in a digital device-provided environment, requiring tailored support based on learners' varying technological accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can classify learner profile types (digital competency, technology accessibility, learning expectations) into four categories
Learners can identify three or more major technical barriers in remote learning environments (internet quality, device compatibility, etc.)
Design personalized educational strategies (e.g., content delivery methods, interaction approaches) based on learner profiles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
